chapters.title: Chapter 1: Seeds of Shadow
chapters.info: Keeper of the Chronicles, p. 19 (7)—Essentially the secretary to the Amyrlin Seat. The Keeper is traditionally from the same Ajah from which the Amyrlin was raised. The office is currently occupied by Leane Sharif of the Blue Ajah. See also Moroso, Gitara; Sharif, Leane.
